BRIL.TA.summary: Brill Shoe Industries Ltd. engages in the fashion and footwear chain business in Israel. The company offers shoes, sandals, boots, sneakers, and slippers for women, men, and children. It markets and sells its products directly through the Gali, Solog, timberland, Lee Cooper, Nine West, Easy Spirit, Anne Klein, NAUTICA, and other shoe brands. The company was formerly known as Brill Shoe Industries (1988) Ltd. and changed its name to Brill Shoe Industries Ltd. in 1988. Brill Shoe Industries Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Rishon LeZion, Israel.

CAST.TA.summary: Castro Model Ltd. operates fashion stores in Israel. The company offers shirts, jeans, pants, shoes, swimwear, jackets, coats, face masks, accessories, and lingerie products for women, men, boys, and girls. It also provides knitwear, bags, and wallets for women and men; dresses and skirts for women and girls; garden suits and pajamas for boys and girls; and leotards, and sets and cases for baby girls and baby boys. In addition, the company offers gift cards. It operates through a chain of stores. The company is based in Bat Yam, Israel. Castro Model Ltd. is a subsidiary of Rotter Holdings Ltd.
